DOC.brief_summary: To assess the safety, tolerability and pharmacokinetics of single and multiple ascending oral doses of lecozotan SR in healthy young and elderly subjects.
DOC.brief_title: Study Evaluating the Safety of Lecozotan SR in Healthy Young and Elderly Subjects
DOC.criteria: Young subjects: Men aged 18 to 45 years. Elderly subjects: Men and women ≥ 65 years of age. Body mass index in the range of 18 to 30 kg/m2 and body weight ≥ 50 kg. Healthy as determined by the investigator. History of any neuropsychiatric disorder. History of drug or alcohol abuse.
